body:
> Hi all!
> 
> I've successfully compiled Radiance using Cygwin on
> Windows XP.


Holy Crap! Thank you so much! This is wonderful.


This allows me to run Radiance at work without
dual-booting, which means that I can set up
Radiance jobs to run in the background while
I continue to do CAD work in Windows.


Also I'm generating a workflow for using Radiance
with AutoDesk Revit; this will make it much easier
for other non-Linux savvy Architects to get their
feet wet with the Shell & Radiance.


Thanks again,


Jeffrey McGrew
